title: Marketplace Tech for Monday, October 21, 2013
teaser: Netflix earnings are out this afternoon; they’re already changing the way we watch. Hackers have wormed their way into the navigation systems of shipping boats. Should we be worried? And farmers are adapting new technology: Social media. It’s a way to push back against negative agricultural stereotypes.
byline: Bruce Johnson, Chester Wisniewski, Stacey Vanek Smith and Christian Fraser
description: Netflix earnings are out this afternoon; they’re already changing the way we watch. Hackers have wormed their way into the navigation systems of shipping boats. Should we be worried? And farmers are adapting new technology: Social media. It’s a way to push back against negative agricultural stereotypes.
